sentences.sContent: The negation of the infinite leads straight to nihilism.
sentences.sContent_eng: The negation of the infinite leads straight to nihilism.
sentences.sCn: 对无极的否认会直接导向虚无主义。

sentences.sContent: And by nihilism, I mean the view that every preference, however squalid, base or sordid, must be regarded as the legitimate equal of every other.
sentences.sContent_eng: And by nihilism, I mean the view that every preference, however squalid, base or sordid, must be regarded as the legitimate equal of every other.
sentences.sCn: 我所谓的虚无主义,意指所有偏好，无论如何卑鄙，拙劣，或下贱都必需被视为,与所有其它同等合法。

synos.tran: 虚无主义；无政府主义；恐怖行为

words.tran: 虚无主义的；无政府主义的
无；虚无；毫无价值的东西

trans.tranCn: [哲]虚无主义, 极端怀疑论
trans.tranOther: the belief that nothing has any meaning or value
